Trade/Device Name(s): EASY CHECK Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for EASY CHECK Blood Glucose Monitoring System and Control Solution for quantitative blood glucose measurement
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from finger, palm, and forearm as an aid in diabetes monitoring; not for diagnosis or neonatal use. Control solution intended to assess system performance.
